title: College Un-Affordability
teaser: The cost of college keeps going up. But family earnings are staying the same. This is leading to an unsustainable […]
description: The cost of college keeps going up. But family earnings are staying the same. This is leading to an unsustainable […]
contentencoded:
The cost of college keeps going up. But family earnings are staying the same. This is leading to an unsustainable situation for both colleges and would-be students.


Guest: Chris Farrell, APM economics editor.
